casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Thomas Larry HERBIN. No. 243P06. Supreme Court of North Carolina. August 17, 2006.

Chrisopher W. Brooks, Assistant Attorney General, William David McFadyen, Jr., District Attorney.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 5th day of May 2006 by Defendant to Proceed as Forma Pauperis:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference this the 17th day of August 2006."
